title: Minor boy’s body found in Assam BJP MP’s house Silchar
selftext: The victim's mother was working in the house of the BJP leader as a domestic help for two-and-a-half years and was originally from Dholai area, he said.
comments: Shady AF. I can't understand how a 10-year-old can commit suicide and why...?.
How long before this news disappears? And media focuses on seema
Poor BJP MLA. He must be so traumatized . . . . .
That's likely to be news to most, including me. Demons these politicians are
Mujhe b just abhi pata chala iss baare mein through a comment on a similar post on another sub.
